turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to place an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you have your ordered here before?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, my name is Shiny Robot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Shiny, what can I get for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a large pepperoni pizza and a medium cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, that's a large pepperoni pizza and a medium cheese pizza. What kind of crust do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular crust on both is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is our regular sauce okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular sauce on the large is fine. But I would like light sauce on the cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will this complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I have a large pepperoni pizza, regular crust and sauce; and a medium cheese pizza on regular crust with light sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total will be $17, will you being cash or credit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be paying with the credit card you have on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, we will send you a receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your pizzas should be ready in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I will see you then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks again for choosing Tasty Pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
